TextView.android:text: It would be a written test but in a different way . Eg . A picture would be printed on a page which may contain a blueprint of any project (say hydroelectric plant / power plant / or any mechanical assembly/ electrical components) , students have to list the problems/ faults in the project and then suggest measures for its proper working .

10 teams will be qualified for this round .In this round , students have to make a robot (which picks a paper ball) just by use of given material . There will be a quiz at start of round which will contain questions regarding video .5 teams will clear the quiz and then they have to start their manufacturing of robot . During the manufacturing , they can ask for help , but for each call there will be a one negative mark for the team .

All 5 teams will compete in this round , the team which is first to make robo will enter this round first . The teams will perform task of picking ball and put it to other end . Each ball correspond to four marks . And accordingly negative marks are given if team call for help in 2nd round .The team which will have maximum marks/points would win !
